title: Orders response
description: Json schema to specify order territories in the optimization payload. For usage details see curl examples in Optimization group

results.title: Order Territories
results.description: Order territories for an optimization payload

territories_id.description: An array of the territory IDs

query.title: Query
query.description: A query text for the orders searching.

scheduled_for_YYMMDD.title: Scheduled For YYMMDD
scheduled_for_YYMMDD.description: Start and end dates to filter the orders by schedule. e.g. ['2019-06-01', '2019-06-18']

tracking_numbers.title: Tracking Numbers
tracking_numbers.description: An array of the tracking numbers to filter the orders by tracking numbers.
